overview: N'Content, the son of a film company owner, falls in love with P'Cop, a handsome guy who is looking for a job position as a security guard. Though they are different in both social status and roles, they are about to learn to know each other, and unforgettable friendship is going to begin.
tagline: There are only two times I want to be with you. "Now and Forever"
title: Midnight Love
